question:
Question: Where are your starting and ending points?  
Choice:  
A. Fly over the sidewalk outside the residential area, above the store door with the gray sign.  
B. Start with a high-altitude view of a city street and end at a roadside store with a gray sign.  
C. Start with a street view of the store and end with the facade of the building on the right.  
D. Start with a detailed view of the store and end with a high-rise building on the right side of the street.  
E. Start from a store with a gray sign and end with an overhead view of a city street.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The video starts with a high-altitude view of a city street, showing a broad perspective of the urban environment. As the sequence progresses, it ends at a roadside store with a gray sign, which is clearly visible in the later frames. This matches the description in option B.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 3), (1:35, 1:39)]
Option: B
Reason: The video begins with a high-altitude, wide shot of a city street, showing multiple high-rise buildings and a broad urban landscape, which matches "Start with a high-altitude view of a city street". The video then gradually descends and zooms in, concluding with a close-up view of several ground-level shops. One of these shops, clearly visible in the final frames, has a prominent gray sign, fitting the description "end at a roadside store with a gray sign". Therefore, option B accurately describes the starting and ending points of the video. The provided answer is consistent with this analysis.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The video starts with a high-altitude view of a city street, showing a broad perspective of the urban environment. As the sequence progresses, it ends at a roadside store with a gray sign, which is clearly visible in the later frames. This matches the description in option B.
